amendment.description: Amendment allows enforcement of criminal and civil sex trafficking laws against websites that knowingly facilitate online sex trafficking.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in House Report 115-583 to allow enforcement of criminal and civil sex trafficking laws against websites that knowingly facilitate online sex trafficking.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Walters, Mimi amendment (A002) Agreed to by recorded vote: 308 - 107 (Roll no. 90).

action.text: Amendment (A002) offered by Mrs. Walters, Mimi.
